alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:13AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through NOON EDT... At 1113 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Cove Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach and World Golf Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
